NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Broadband 2018
NewsItem.SUMMARY: The industry gold standard for 5G radio architecture. This report examines infrastructure and handsets, as well as tablet/PC and IoT devices to understand the limits of technology and the rationale for deployment.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Detailed cost analysis is provided for both infrastructure and client devices. The technical and cost analyses are used to create a forecast through 2025, illustrating 5G adoption by band, by architecture, and showing NSA vs SA deployment. Competitive intelligence is included with power levels, photos, and analysis of each vendor's products.
